widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

description: Hi everyone! I'm David Lopez, and I come from Saltillo, Coahuila. I'm 25 years old and work as a computer systems engineer. I really believe that it's important to share knowledge rather than keeping it to ourselves. I enjoy trying out new tech stuff, cooking, watching and playing sports, and listening to music. I'm super excited about joining this team and ready to take on whatever challenges come my way!

Hello, my name is Roye Bustan! I am 27 years old and from Los Angeles, California. I graduated from UCSD with a bachelor's in Applied Mathematics. I am a naturally curious and social person and love meeting new people. I enjoy surfing, traveling, and martial arts in my spare time! I am stoked to join Justia and excited to get to know you all!
